design_system.name: StudySmart Neon Focus
design_system.description: A high-contrast, focus-driven aesthetic combining deep void backgrounds with electric violet accents to create a gamified yet serious productivity environment.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors defined in 'colors.palette'. Extend the theme, do not overwrite.
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl' to meet the 'Rounded corners everywhere' requirement.
4. DARK MODE DEFAULT: Ensure the 'dark' class is applied to the html/body by default. The light mode toggle should remove it.
5. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the 'glassmorphism' utility class defined in visual_enhancers for all floating elements (navbars, modals, toasts).
6. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style the tooltips to match the 'cards.base' style (dark, glass, bordered).
7. NOISE: Add the noise texture to the main background to avoid the 'flat digital' look.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) for testing.
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use Deep Void (#030712).
Interactive elements must have clear hover states (lift, glow, or color shift).
Animations should be smooth (ease-out) and purposeful, not distracting.
